00039 typedef enum
00040 {
00041   STAGE_FETCH,
00042   STAGE_UNPACK,
00043   STAGE_CONFIGURE,
00044   STAGE_BUILD,
00045   STAGE_INSTALL
00046 } AppRoverHaltStageType;
00047 
00049 class AppRover
